channel.title: zDiddyReloaded - 377
channel.description:
zDiddyReloaded is a remake project that we're currently working on, the reason we're doing this is because we have the ability to do so and we really miss playing it. The concept of ZDR will not be changed, however, the efficiency and quality of the server will be better than what ZDR ever had.
Webclient Link: http://zdiddyreloaded.com/webclient.html Forums: http://zdiddyreloaded.com/index.php
Client Content: •474 Maps/Graphics/Animations/Items/NPCs •Cached Packed Everything Except Some Sprites •317 Skill Interface •474 Gameframe •Proper Yellow Tooltips •Fullscreen Interface Support •Cache Size: 35.27mb •Auto Cache Downloader •ScreenShot (Captures Client Frame Not Whole Window) •Updated Interfaces (Attack/Skill/Prayer/Lunar/Magic/Emotes) •Black Map Area Fixed •Tab To Reply
Server Content:
- Combat
- PvP fully complete - PvN fully complete - Near perfect max hit formulas - Perfect accuracy formula - Every weapon special attack - Equipment effects (i.e. barrows) - Equipment requirements - Degradable equipment/weapons - Weapon poisoning
- Ranged
- Bows/Arrows - Throwing weapons (knives, darts) - Crossbows - Can't shoot through walls - Ranged distances
- Magic
- Every modern combat spell - Every ancient combat spell - Every lunar spell - Can't mage through walls - Charge w/ godspells - Teleblock/binding/freezing - Every other spell including: - Alching/Superheat - Enchanting jewelry
- Prayer
- All bones bury-able - Bones on altar - Every prayer working properly - Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
- Runecrafting
- Every rune can be crafted - Fully working abyss
- Agility
- Gnome course - Barbarian course - Wilderness course - Handy shortcuts through the game
- Herblore
- Creating potions - Grinding - Correct Supplies, spices and ingredients - Mixing - Emptying
- Thieving
- Stalls - Pickpocket
- Crafting
- Gems - Jewelry - Pottery - Glass - Armour - Spinning - Staffs - Tanning
- Fletching
- Crossbow making/stringing - Arrows/darts/bolts - Shortbow/Longbow making/stringing
- Slayer
- Slayer Area - Slayer Master - Enchanted Gem - Resonable tasks based on Combat Level
- Mining
- All ores mineable - Random gem while mining - Gem rocks - Mining guild
- Smithing
- Every bar smeltable - Every item makeable
- Fishing
- Every fish fishable - Right emotes/bait used - Fishing guild
- Cooking
- Burning formula - All fish/meat/potato's cookable - Cooking gauntlets - Cooking guild
- Firemaking
- Every log burnable - Right burning timers - Clipped
- Woodcutting
- Every tree chopable - Bird nests - Right emotes/timers - LumbarJack clothing gives boost
- Farming
- Seeds - Patches - Raking - 100%
- Miscellaneous
- Global objects - Global items - Clipping - Random Events - Sandwhich Lady - Genie - Zombie - Tree Spirit - Freaky Froster - Rock Golem - Evil Chicken - God Books Preaching - Mithril Seeds - Spinning Plates - Pheonix Neckalse - Ring Of Life - 99% DragonFire Shield (Includes charging) - Ring Of Recoil - Grim Reaper - Full Dagganoth Lair - 2005 Whip Special + 2010 Whip Special - Custom infractions system
Core Content: - Refurbished GameEngine - Graham's task & event system used across the source - New saving system
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img10/3739/skillshops.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img827/3787/imsage3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img266/4089/imsage6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img11/6681/vials.png[/img]

item.title: zDiddyReloaded - 377
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Can't shoot through walls

make sure to test this on different height levels this is largely overlooked in clipping systems

OT: good luck

Read full topic
